channel.title: #317 Packet 40 - Chat interface click
channel.description:
I was going through the rswiki and realised this packet wasn't there, I was eventually led to it while trying to fix closing the level up interface. I can't add it to the wiki for some reason so i'll post it's structure here until i'm granted rights to create pages on it (or i'm just really stupid at using the UI).
[hr]
Description: Sent when clicking buttons in the chat interface? ie click to continue
[img]http://puu.sh/6HCHL.png[/img]
[hr]
Structure OPCODE 40 LENGTH 2
Short - frame id
[hr]
Here is how the refactored 317 client sends it: [code=java]if(l == 679 && !aBoolean1149) { stream.createFrame(40); // OPCODE 40 stream.writeWord(k); // SHORT (word) : val (k) aBoolean1149 = true; }[/code]
[hr]
I doubt anybody needs a tutorial explaining how to add the working skill interfaces to their server, but if you do I will consider writing it I guess.

item.title: #317 Packet 40 - Chat interface click
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I was going through the rswiki and realised this packet wasn’t there, I was eventually led to it while trying to fix closing the level up interface. I can’t add it to the wiki for some reason so i’ll post it’s structure here until i’m granted rights to create pages on it (or i’m just really stupid at using the UI).

[hr]

Description: Sent when clicking buttons in the chat interface?
ie click to continue

[hr]

Structure
OPCODE 40
LENGTH 2

Short - frame id

[hr]

Here is how the refactored 317 client sends it:

if(l == 679 && !aBoolean1149) { stream.createFrame(40); // OPCODE 40 stream.writeWord(k); // SHORT (word) : val (k) aBoolean1149 = true; }

[hr]

I doubt anybody needs a tutorial explaining how to add the working skill interfaces to their server, but if you do I will consider writing it I guess.
